node.category: What is the way things are?
What about shopping on the weekends?
What do I personally think about shopping on the weekends?

node.surface: Well, I as an employee find it very practical to be able to shop at least on weekends.

node.category: What is the disadvantage for other people?

node.surface: Sure, other people have to work in the shops on the weekend,

node.category: Is there any compensation for that?

node.surface: but they can have days off during the week
and run errands at their leisure

node.category: What do I do during that time?

node.surface: while I'm stuck in the office.

node.category: What is an additional argument for opening the stores on sunday?

node.surface: Plus, the state wants me to spend my money,
and how am I supposed to do that when the shops aren't open when I'm off work?
